Package estimate.player

Class SelectCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • estimate.player.SelectCard
  • public class SelectCard
extends java.lang.Object
    The SelectCard class returns the best card to play when the computer is:

    the first player with a positive bid

    the first player with a negative bid

    not the first player with a positive bid

    not the first player with a negative bid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SelectCard()
      Constructs an instance of SelectCard

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card pickCardFirstPlayerPositive​(PlayerHand playerHand, Suit trumpSuit)
      Returns the best Card to play when the computer is the First player of the trick and the Computer's bid is positive
      Card pickCardFirstPlayerZero​(PlayerHand playerHand, Suit trumpSuit)
      Returns the best Card to play when the computer is the First player of the trick and the Computer's bid is zero
      Card pickCardNextPlayerPositive​(PlayerHand playerHand, Suit trumpSuit, Suit leadSuit, Card highestPlayedCard)
      Returns the best Card to play when the computer is Not the first player of the trick and the Computer's bid is positive
      Card pickCardNextPlayerZero​(PlayerHand playerHand, Suit trumpSuit, Suit leadSuit, Card highestPlayedCard)
      Returns the best Card to play when the computer is Not the first player of the trick and the Computer's bid is zero

    • Method Detail

      • pickCardFirstPlayerPositive

        public Card pickCardFirstPlayerPositive​(PlayerHand playerHand,
                                        Suit trumpSuit)
        Returns the best Card to play when the computer is the First player of the trick and the Computer's bid is positive

        It follows a set of rules defined in BidPosFirstCardComparator

        Parameters:
        playerHand - the Hand of Cards that will be evaluated
        trumpSuit - the trumpSuit used in that round of the game
        Returns:
        the best Card to play following a set of rules

      • pickCardFirstPlayerZero

        public Card pickCardFirstPlayerZero​(PlayerHand playerHand,
                                    Suit trumpSuit)
        Returns the best Card to play when the computer is the First player of the trick and the Computer's bid is zero

        It follows a set of rules defined in BidZeroFirstCardComparator

        Parameters:
        playerHand - the Hand of Cards that will be evaluated
        trumpSuit - the trumpSuit used in that round of the game
        Returns:
        the best Card to play following a set of rules

      • pickCardNextPlayerPositive

        public Card pickCardNextPlayerPositive​(PlayerHand playerHand,
                                       Suit trumpSuit,
                                       Suit leadSuit,
                                       Card highestPlayedCard)
        Returns the best Card to play when the computer is Not the first player of the trick and the Computer's bid is positive
        Parameters:
        playerHand - the Hand of Cards that will be evaluated
        trumpSuit - the trumpSuit used in that round of the game
        leadSuit - the leadSuit used in that trick of the game
        highestPlayedCard - the highest played card so far in the trick
        Returns:
        the best Card to play following a set of rules

      • pickCardNextPlayerZero

        public Card pickCardNextPlayerZero​(PlayerHand playerHand,
                                   Suit trumpSuit,
                                   Suit leadSuit,
                                   Card highestPlayedCard)
        Returns the best Card to play when the computer is Not the first player of the trick and the Computer's bid is zero
        Parameters:

        trumpSuit - the trumpSuit used in that round of the game
        leadSuit - the leadSuit used in that trick of the game
        highestPlayedCard - the highest played card so far in the trick

        the best Card to play following a set of rules
